entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres rising to 1400 metres near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of showers over southern sections then partly cloudy. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 800 metres. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
